trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality common to control arrays in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 实现从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级应用程序中的控件数组共同的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: You do not typically inherit from `BaseControlArray`.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不继承从`BaseControlArray`。

trans-unit.source: To create your own control array, inherit from one of the control array classes in the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6` namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建你自己的控件数组，从一个中的控件数组类继承`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6`命名空间。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 因为此类通常不用于创建类的实例，此构造函数通常不直接调用，但而由派生类调用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray"></xref> class, optionally specifying a container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray"></xref>类，可以选择指定一个容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 因为此类通常不用于创建类的实例，此构造函数通常不直接调用，但而由派生类调用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> where the control array will be hosted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>将托管控件数组的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control is a member of a control array.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否是控件数组的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a member of the control array; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件是控件数组中; 的成员否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> specifying whether the control was created at design time (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>) or at run time (<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Stores values that represent the controls in a control array.
trans-unit.target: 存储表示控件数组中的控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of controls in a control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中返回的控件的数量。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property in a [For...Next Statement](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to perform an operation on the controls in a control array.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性在[为...下一条语句](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)控件数组中执行对控件的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: A Short that contains the number of controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的数目为短整型。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a control in a control array and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由控件数组中控件使用的非托管的资源，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 当处置参数是`true`，此方法释放由该控件引用任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Stores a value indicating whether the initialization code for a control array's container has finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 存储一个值，该值控制数组的容器的初始化代码是否已完成执行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of a control in a control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中返回的控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method must be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray"></xref> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray"> </xref>类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this <xref uid="langword_csharp_Protected" name="Protected" href=""></xref> method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此类不通常用于创建类的实例，因为这<xref uid="langword_csharp_Protected" name="Protected" href=""></xref>方法通常不直接调用，但改为调用由派生类。

trans-unit.target: 返回到一个枚举器对象，它用于循环访问控件数组的引用。

trans-unit.source: Adds event handlers for a control in a control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中添加的控件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.target: 必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that contains the smallest available subscript for a control array.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref>包含的控件数组的最小可用下标。

trans-unit.source: The `LBound` function is used with the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.UBound%2A> function to determine the size of a control array.
trans-unit.target: `LBound`函数用于处理<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.UBound%2A>函数来确定控件数组的大小。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.UBound%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new element in a control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中创建一个新元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is the equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 `Load` function for dynamically creating a new control array element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于 Visual Basic 6.0`Load`用于动态创建新的控制数组元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that represents the index of the new control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""> </xref>表示新的控件索引。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of the control.
trans-unit.target: 开始初始化控件。

trans-unit.source: Design environments typically use this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 设计环境通常使用此方法来启动窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件的初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.EndInit%2A>方法初始化已结束。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the `BeginInit` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用`BeginInit`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.EndInit%2A>方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的初始化已结束。

trans-unit.source: Design environments typically use this method to finish the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 设计环境通常使用此方法来完成的窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件初始化。

trans-unit.source: The `EndInit` method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: `EndInit`方法初始化已结束。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BeginInit%2A> and `EndInit` methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BeginInit%2A>和`EndInit`方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that contains the largest available subscript for a control array.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含的控件数组的最大可用的下标。

trans-unit.source: The `UBound` function is used with the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.LBound%2A> function to determine the size of a control array.
trans-unit.target: `UBound`函数用于处理<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.LBound%2A>函数来确定控件数组的大小。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.LBound%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that contains the upper bounds of a control array.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""> </xref> ，它包含控件数组的上限。

trans-unit.source: Removes a control from a control array.
trans-unit.target: 从控件数组中移除控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is the equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 `Unload` function for dynamically removing a control array element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于 Visual Basic 6.0`Unload`动态删除控制数组元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only controls that were added dynamically by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method can be removed from the control array.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由使用动态添加的控件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法可以从控件数组中移除。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用的所有控件数组的基类。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that represents the index of the control to remove.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""> </xref> ，表示要删除的控件索引。
